alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; Morgan County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Weld and Morgan Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 559 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Milton Reservoir, or 14 miles southeast of Greeley, moving southeast at 20 mph. Additional storms will continue to develop across southeast Weld and Morgan counties through 7 pm. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greeley, Fort Morgan, Evans, Lochbuie, Eaton, Hudson, LaSalle, Kersey, Keenesburg, Wiggins, Log Lane Village, Weldona, Twelve-Mile Corner, Orchard, Riverside Reservoir, Milton Reservoir, Lucerne, Goodrich, Roggen and Hoyt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
